buildup.text: Before conductors existed, the first violinist or harpsichordist led from their seat.

discovery.text: A conductor controls tempo, dynamics, balance, and the emotional arc of each performance.

twist.text: Two conductors can make the same orchestra playing the same piece sound completely different.

punchline.text: They play the silence between the notes. That's the hardest instrument.
